channel.title: [317]Creating Item Stats[317]
channel.description: Hello guys, and welcome to my 2nd server tutorial. Files need: Server Source. First, you will need to open up item.cfg. You will see something like this: [code=javascript]item = 1949 Fighter_hat A_partially_charged_rod. 1 35 1 5 5 5 -7 -7 27 29 26 -3 28 0 0 item = 2677 Attack_cape Its a Attack_cape 99000 99000 99000 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 0 item = 2680 Strength_cape Its a Strength_cape 99000 99000 99000 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 0 item = 2683 Defence_cape Its a Defence_cape 99000 99000 99000 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 0 item = 2686 Range_cape Its a Range_cape 99000 99000 99000 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 0 item = 2689 Prayer_cape Its a Prayer_cape 99000 99000 99000 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 0 item = 2692 Magic_cape Its a Magic_cape 99000 99000 99000 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 0 item = 2695 Firemaking_cape Its a Firemaking_cape 99000 99000 99000 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 0 item = 2698 Runecrafting_cape Its a RuneCrafting_cape 99000 99000 99000 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 0 item = 2701 Hitpoints_cape Its a Hitpoint_cape 99000 99000 99000 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 0 item = 2704 Agility_cape Its a Agility_cape 99000 99000 99000 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 0 item = 2707 Herblore_cape Its a Herblore_cape 99000 99000 99000 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 0 item = 2710 Thieving_cape Its a Thieving_cape 99000 99000 99000 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 0 item = 2713 Crafting_cape Its a Crafting_cape 99000 99000 99000 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 0 item = 2716 Fletching_cape Its a Fletching_cape 99000 99000 99000 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 0 item = 2719 Slayer_cape Its a Slayer_cape 99000 99000 99000 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 0 item = 2722 Mining_cape Its a Mining_cape 99000 99000 99000 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 0 item = 2725 Smithing_cape Its a Smithing_cape 99000 99000 99000 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 0 item = 2728 Fishing_cape Its a Fishing_cape 99000 99000 99000 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 0 item = 2731 Cooking_cape Its a cooking_cape 99000 99000 99000 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 0 item = 2734 Woodcutting_cape Its a Woodcutting_cape 99000 99000 99000 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 0 item = 2737 Farming_cape Its a Farming_cape 99000 99000 99000 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 0 item = 4319 Attack_cape A_partially_charged_rod. 1000 99000 600 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 4 item = 4359 Strength_cape A_partially_charged_rod. 1000 99000 600 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 4 item = 4329 Defence_cape A_partially_charged_rod. 1000 99000 600 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 4 item = 4351 Range_cape A_partially_charged_rod. 1000 99000 600 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 4 item = 4347 Prayer_cape A_partially_charged_rod. 1000 99000 600 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 4 item = 4343 Magic_cape A_partially_charged_rod. 1000 99000 600 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 4 item = 4333 Runecrafting_cape A_partially_charged_rod. 1000 99000 600 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 4 item = 4341 Hitpoints_cape A_partially_charged_rod. 1000 99000 600 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 4 item = 4317 Agility_cape A_partially_charged_rod. 1000 99000 600 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 4 item = 4339 Herblore_cape A_partially_charged_rod. 1000 99000 600 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 4 item = 4361 Thieving_cape A_partially_charged_rod. 1000 99000 600 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 4[/code] First find your item you want to make stats to. Then add it like this [code=javascript]item = (ITEMID) Item_Name Item_Description ITEMCost ITEMCOST ITEMCOST StabAttBonus SlashAttBonus CrushAttBonus MageAttBonus RangeBonus StabDefBonus SlashDefBonus CrushDefBonus MageDefBonus RangeDefBonus StrOthBonus PrayerOthBonus[/code] Once you add all of the wished stats you want, you need to compile, and then restart source. Now the item you changed/added the stats to, should be like what you entered. If you have any questions/errors, please feel free to message me, and I'll use Teamviewer to give you assistance!:)

item.title: [317]Creating Item Stats[317]
item.dc:creator: @float4life float4life
item.description:
@float4life wrote:

Hello guys, and welcome to my 2nd server tutorial. Files need: Server Source.
First, you will need to open up item.cfg. You will see something like this:

item = 1949 Fighter_hat A_partially_charged_rod. 1 35 1 5 5 5 -7 -7 27 29 26 -3 28 0 0 item = 2677 Attack_cape Its a Attack_cape 99000 99000 99000 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 0 item = 2680 Strength_cape Its a Strength_cape 99000 99000 99000 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 0 item = 2683 Defence_cape Its a Defence_cape 99000 99000 99000 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 0 item = 2686 Range_cape Its a Range_cape 99000 99000 99000 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 0 item = 2689 Prayer_cape Its a Prayer_cape 99000 99000 99000 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 0 item = 2692 Magic_cape Its a Magic_cape 99000 99000 99000 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 0 item = 2695 Firemaking_cape Its a Firemaking_cape 99000 99000 99000 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 0 item = 2698 Runecrafting_cape Its a RuneCrafting_cape 99000 99000 99000 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 0 item = 2701 Hitpoints_cape Its a Hitpoint_cape 99000 99000 99000 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 0 item = 2704 Agility_cape Its a Agility_cape 99000 99000 99000 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 0 item = 2707 Herblore_cape Its a Herblore_cape 99000 99000 99000 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 0 item = 2710 Thieving_cape Its a Thieving_cape 99000 99000 99000 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 0 item = 2713 Crafting_cape Its a Crafting_cape 99000 99000 99000 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 0 item = 2716 Fletching_cape Its a Fletching_cape 99000 99000 99000 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 0 item = 2719 Slayer_cape Its a Slayer_cape 99000 99000 99000 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 0 item = 2722 Mining_cape Its a Mining_cape 99000 99000 99000 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 0 item = 2725 Smithing_cape Its a Smithing_cape 99000 99000 99000 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 0 item = 2728 Fishing_cape Its a Fishing_cape 99000 99000 99000 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 0 item = 2731 Cooking_cape Its a cooking_cape 99000 99000 99000 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 0 item = 2734 Woodcutting_cape Its a Woodcutting_cape 99000 99000 99000 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 0 item = 2737 Farming_cape Its a Farming_cape 99000 99000 99000 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 0 item = 4319 Attack_cape A_partially_charged_rod. 1000 99000 600 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 4 item = 4359 Strength_cape A_partially_charged_rod. 1000 99000 600 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 4 item = 4329 Defence_cape A_partially_charged_rod. 1000 99000 600 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 4 item = 4351 Range_cape A_partially_charged_rod. 1000 99000 600 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 4 item = 4347 Prayer_cape A_partially_charged_rod. 1000 99000 600 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 4 item = 4343 Magic_cape A_partially_charged_rod. 1000 99000 600 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 4 item = 4333 Runecrafting_cape A_partially_charged_rod. 1000 99000 600 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 4 item = 4341 Hitpoints_cape A_partially_charged_rod. 1000 99000 600 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 4 item = 4317 Agility_cape A_partially_charged_rod. 1000 99000 600 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 4 item = 4339 Herblore_cape A_partially_charged_rod. 1000 99000 600 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 4 item = 4361 Thieving_cape A_partially_charged_rod. 1000 99000 600 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 4
First find your item you want to make stats to. Then add it like this

item = (ITEMID)	Item_Name	Item_Description	ITEMCost		ITEMCOST	ITEMCOST	StabAttBonus	SlashAttBonus	CrushAttBonus	MageAttBonus	RangeBonus	StabDefBonus	SlashDefBonus	CrushDefBonus	MageDefBonus	RangeDefBonus	StrOthBonus	PrayerOthBonus

Once you add all of the wished stats you want, you need to compile, and then restart source. Now the item you changed/added the stats to, should be like what you entered. If you have any questions/errors, please feel free to message me, and I’ll use Teamviewer to give you assistance!

Read full topic
